results.title: Impaired Pten Expression in Human Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumours
results.text_hl: The IC50 of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010524 @@@MPNST@@@ cell lines ranged between 0.1-1.0 microM.
